data.title: Climate & Weather Averages in Santa Maria, California, USA
data.meta_description: Climate data and weather averages in Santa Maria
data.text:
Currently: 10 °C. Fog. (Weather station: Santa Maria Public Airport, USA). See more current weather

Annual Weather Averages Near Santa Maria

Averages are for Santa Maria Public Airport, which is 6 kilometers from Santa Maria.

Based on weather reports collected during 1992–2021.
